greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is an odd square not divisible by 3, else it's 0.
comment: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 1 if 2 divides e and p > 3, 0 otherwise. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 09 2005
reference: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 105, Eq. (41).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
formula: Euler transform of a period 144 sequence. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 26 2008
Dirichlet g.f. zeta(2*s) *(1-2^(-2s)) *(1-3^(-2s)). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 10 2011
G.f.: Sum_{k in Z} x^(6*k+1)^2. - _Michael Somos_, Dec 07 2019
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ (EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, x^4] - EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, x^36])/2, {x, 0, n}] // PowerExpand; (* _Michael Somos_, Dec 07 2019 *)
program: a033683 n = fromEnum $ odd n && mod n 3 > 0 && a010052 n == 1
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
